title: Can I use images from other blogs just giving credit to the original author? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, it depends. If the blog owner gave credits to the original owner, reference both sources properly but if you're sure the blog owner isn't the original owner, give credits to the original owner. This helped me so much when I got Google's approval to monetize my website.

You need written permission from the rights-holder for that image. Many bloggers fail to get that permission, which leaves them vulnerable to losing everything that they own, if the creator of the image chooses to take action. Many people think that works on the web are in the public domain. They are VERY wrong.
